description.717c: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, increases Clue search speed by <@cc.vup>10%</>, and when assigned together with <@cc.kw>Typhon</>, increases Clue search speed by an additional <@cc.vup>15%</> while self Morale loss per hour <@cc.vdown>+0.5</>, and increases the likelihood of obtaining clues that are not on the Clue Board
description.fd91: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, if no other Operators are working in the Reception Room, increases Clue search speed by <@cc.vup>35%</>

description.a6c0: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, if no other Operators are working in the Reception Room, increases Clue search speed by <@cc.vup>15%</>, and Morale consumed per hour <@cc.vdown>+1</>
description.8a17: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, if no other Operators are working in the Reception Room, increases Clue search speed by <@cc.vup>35%</>, and Morale consumed per hour <@cc.vdown>+1</>

description.341d: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Ursus Student Self-Governing Group</> clues is increased (working time improves the likelihood).

description.308a: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, every time that a non-<@cc.kw>Rhine Lab</> clue is collected, the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Rhine Lab</> clues is increased (working time improves the likelihood)
description.4c5c: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, every time that a non-<@cc.kw>Karlan Trade</> clue is collected, the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Karlan Trade</> clues is increased (working time improves the likelihood)
description.f3ca: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, increases the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Ursus Student Self-Governing Group</> clues for every newly-obtained Clue that is not from <@cc.kw>Ursus Student Self-Governing Group</> (working time improves this likelihood).
description.3f8a: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, every time that a non-<@cc.kw>Rhodes Island</> clue is collected, increases the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Rhodes Island</> clues (Rate is influenced by length of work time)
description.d3c2: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, every time that a non-<@cc.kw>Glasgow</> clue is collected, the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Glasgow</> clues is increased (working time improves the likelihood)
